text: Elena Benarroch Elena Benarroch is a Spanish fashion designer born in Tangier in 1955 within a Moroccan Jewish family. She opened a furrier's in Madrid in 1979 and has won many awards in Spain. ==References== ==External links== *Elenabenarroch.es: Elena Benarroch website Category:Spanish fashion designers Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Jewish fashion designers Category:Moroccan emigrants to Spain Category:Moroccan Jews Category:People from Tangier Category:Spanish Jews Category:Spanish people of Moroccan-Jewish descent
title: Elena Benarroch
